data.text: @jaimeici Hi, please send us a DM with your email address used and a brief description of how we can help. Thank you!
@HaorenSun Please send us a DM for further assistance. Sinemia Cardless is available to users who haven't received their cards yet. The latest version of the app should be installed.
@SinemiaApp Cuz It says: You need to activate your card before first use? https://t.co/niIQvwcWyN
@HaorenSun Why don't you use Sinemia Cardless? #sinemiacardless
@SinemiaApp Already did two weeks ago. But what you told me was there’s nothing I can do but waiting and you’re unable to give me ETA. Now I sent it again and hope I can get a better answer.
@HaorenSun Hi, please send us a DM with your email address used and a brief description of how we can help. Thank you!
@MadHattered1966 @SinemiaApp I have the same problem. I have been waiting for my card over a month! And I haven’t received any shipping info. No one’s telling me what’s going on!
@MadHattered1966 Hi, please send us a DM with your email address used and a brief description of how we can help. Thank you!
@SinemiaApp When you state 7 working days to get the card we paid up front for, did you really mean 7 to 30? It’s going on 3 weeks now and still no card. Movipass all over again.
